title: How does enemy vision of Bards charms work?
body: If a chime spawns in the fog of war and the enemy team hasn't had vision of it yet, can they see it on the minimap? Couldn't this potentially give alerts to plays? If Bard picks up a chime while ganking, sneaking a dragon/baron or rotating with his team the enemy team would be made aware of it by the charms disappearing off the minimap, despite having no vision.

replies.body: it doesn't show up on the enemies minimap. even if they have vision of it.
